reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 335, MICB 325. (One of MICB 201 or MICB 301 is recommended.)
To be added to a wait-list, email Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
description: Intrinsic and extrinsic forces driving prokaryotic genome evolution. Gene transfer; microbial species concepts; community genome structure, function and dynamics; ecological impacts of microbial genome diversity. Emphasis on problem solving and experimental design.
